title: Routines - Group Text
content:
I'm trying to create a routine that sends a single message to a group. 

Custom Command:
Text Larry saying Did you get a Pixel?

Sends a text to Larry saying: 
"Did you get a Pixel?" 

This Works perfectly for sending a message to 1 person. 
-
Custom Command:
Text Larry and Jerry saying Did you guys get Pixels? 

Sends a text to Larry saying: 
"and Jerry saying Did you guys get Pixels?"

How do I set it up so that it sends the 1 text message to both Larry and Jerry in the same conversation?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel
